Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n8txz0olN11rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/4VHLBelpKFI" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Gero M created a very surreal, very cool KSP short as a student project. The KSP team was impressed with the amount of effort that went into this production and we hope you will be, too.</p>
Awesome video from a young animator! Well done!
The burning question is, did he make it back home to Kerbal?
